verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to the <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H5892>city!<s%> it is <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H3585>lies<s%> and <S%H6563>robbery;<s%> the <S%H2964>prey<s%> <S%H4185>departeth<s%> <S%H3808>not;<s%>

The <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H7752>whip,<s%> and the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H7494>rattling<s%> of the <S%H212>wheels,<s%> and of the <S%H1725>prancing<s%> <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and of the <S%H7540>jumping<s%> <S%H4818>chariots.<s%>

The <S%H6571>horseman<s%> lifteth <S%H5927>up<s%> both the <S%H3851>bright<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> and the <S%H1300>glittering<s%> <S%H2595>spear:<s%> and there is a <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H2491>slain,<s%> and a great <S%H3514>number<s%> of <S%H6297>carcasses;<s%> and there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H7097>end<s%> of their <S%H1472>corpses;<s%> they <S%H3782>stumble<s%> upon their corpses: <S%H1472><s%>

Because of the <S%H4480>multitude<s%> <S%H7230><s%> of the <S%H2183>whoredoms<s%> of the well <S%H2896>favored<s%> <S%H2580><s%> <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> the <S%H1172>mistress<s%> of <S%H3785>witchcrafts,<s%> that <S%H4376>selleth<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> through her <S%H2183>whoredoms,<s%> and <S%H4940>families<s%> through her <S%H3785>witchcrafts.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> and I will <S%H1540>discover<s%> thy <S%H7757>skirts<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H6440>face,<s%> and I will <S%H7200>show<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> thy <S%H4626>nakedness,<s%> and the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> thy <S%H7036>shame.<s%>
And I will <S%H7993>cast<s%> abominable <S%H8251>filth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, and make thee <S%H5034>vile,<s%> and will <S%H7760>set<s%> thee as a <S%H7210>gazingstock.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> they that look <S%H7200>upon<s%> thee shall <S%H5074>flee<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee, and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> is laid <S%H7703>waste:<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> will <S%H5110>bemoan<s%> her? <S%H4480>whence<s%> <S%H370><s%> shall I <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H5162>comforters<s%> for thee?

Art thou <S%H3190>better<s%> than <S%H528>populous<s%> <S%H4480>No,<s%> <S%H4996><s%> that was <S%H3427>situate<s%> among the <S%H2975>rivers,<s%> that had the <S%H4325>waters<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> it, <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H2426>rampart<s%> was the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and her <S%H2346>wall<s%> was from the <S%H4480>sea?<s%> <S%H3220><s%>

Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%> and <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> were her <S%H6109>strength,<s%> and it was <S%H369>infinite;<s%> <S%H7097><s%> <S%H6316>Put<s%> and <S%H3864>Lubim<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> thy <S%H5833>helpers.<s%>

Yet <S%H1571><s%> was <S%H1931>she<s%> carried <S%H1473>away,<s%> she <S%H1980>went<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity:<s%> her young <S%H5768>children<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> were dashed in <S%H7376>pieces<s%> at the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2351>streets:<s%> and they <S%H3032>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> her honorable <S%H3513>men,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> her great <S%H1419>men<s%> were <S%H7576>bound<s%> in <S%H2131>chains.<s%>

Thou <S%H859><s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shalt be <S%H7937>drunken:<s%> thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5956>hid,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shalt <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H4581>strength<s%> because of the <S%H4480>enemy.<s%> <S%H341><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> thy <S%H4013>strongholds<s%> shall be like fig <S%H8384>trees<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the firstripe <S%H1061>figs:<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> they be <S%H5128>shaken,<s%> they shall even <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H398>eater.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee are <S%H802>women:<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of thy <S%H776>land<s%> shall be set wide <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H6605><s%> unto thine <S%H341>enemies:<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> thy <S%H1280>bars.<s%>

Draw <S%H7579><s%> thee <S%H4325>waters<s%> for the <S%H4692>siege,<s%> <S%H2388>fortify<s%> thy <S%H4013>strongholds:<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> into <S%H2916>clay,<s%> and <S%H7429>tread<s%> the <S%H2563>mortar,<s%> make <S%H2388>strong<s%> the <S%H4404>brickkiln.<s%>

There <S%H8033><s%> shall the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>devour<s%> thee; the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall cut thee <S%H3772>off,<s%> it shall eat thee <S%H398>up<s%> like the <S%H3218>cankerworm:<s%> make thyself <S%H3513>many<s%> as the <S%H3218>cankerworm,<s%> make thyself <S%H3513>many<s%> as the <S%H697>locusts.<s%>

Thou hast <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> thy <S%H7402>merchants<s%> above the <S%H4480>stars<s%> <S%H3556><s%> of <S%H8064>heaven:<s%> the <S%H3218>cankerworm<s%> <S%H6584>spoileth,<s%> and flieth <S%H5774>away.<s%>

Thy <S%H4502>crowned<s%> are as the <S%H697>locusts,<s%> and thy <S%H2951>captains<s%> as the great <S%H1462>grasshoppers,<s%> <S%H1462><s%> which <S%H2583>camp<s%> in the <S%H1448>hedges<s%> in the <S%H7135>cold<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> but when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H2224>ariseth<s%> they flee <S%H5074>away,<s%> and their <S%H4725>place<s%> is not <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H335>where<s%> they are.

Thy <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H5123>slumber,<s%> O <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria:<s%> thy <S%H117>nobles<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the dust: thy <S%H5971>people<s%> is <S%H6335>scattered<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and no <S%H369>man<s%> <S%H6908>gathereth<s%> them.

There is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3545>healing<s%> of thy <S%H7667>bruise;<s%> thy <S%H4347>wound<s%> is <S%H2470>grievous:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H8088>bruit<s%> of thee shall <S%H8628>clap<s%> the <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> thee: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H4310>whom<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> thy <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H8548>continually?<s%>
